title: Three Big Ideas
description: On today's show, ideas to fight the virus, get people money, and revive a multibillion-dollar corner of the economy. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Three Big Ideas
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Spend billions on vaccine factories we'll never use. Set up autopay to send checks to almost everybody. Build a giant bubble for an entire sports league.
itunes:subtitle: Spend billions on vaccine factories we'll never use. Set up autopay to send checks to almost everybody. Build a giant bubble for an entire sports league.
